sourcesContent:
export default {
  "navigation": {
    "sicbo": "Sicbo",
    "store": "Store",
    "setting": {
      "music": "Music",
      "effect": "Effect",
    },
    "wallet": "Wallet",
    "bonus": "Bonus",
    "vip": "VIP",
    "referral": "Referral",
    "login": "Login",
    "logout": "Logout",
    "pleaseLogin": "Please Login"
  },
  "home": {
    "announcement": "光 Sicbo released!",
    "aboutGuangSicbo": "One of China's oldest traditional games, 光 Sicbo is played with 2 flower cards instead of dice.",
    "leaderboard": {
      "title": "Today's Leaderboard",
      "rank": "Rank",
      "player": "Player",
      "wagerPoints": "Bet",
      "prize": "Prize",
      "notice": "Prize will be sent automatically every day",
    },
    "dividend": {
      "title": "Dividend",
      "description": "Stake TAZ for dividends. The dividends are settled once everyday at midnight. Your portion of the payout will be credited to your balance and can be claimed at your convenience",
    },
    "winningPrize": {
      "title": "Winning prize",
      "description": "Leaderboards will be ranked based on the total amount of bets. Prizes will be awarded to the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place winners. Show off your skills on the leaderboard and win prizes!",
    },
    "partners": "Partners",
  },
  "footer": {
    "contact": "Contact",
    "description": "The games provided by Guang Game are based on blockchain, fair and transparent but no persons under the age of 21 are permitted to the games. These guessing games are entertainment gaming services that involve some financial risk. It is the sole responsibility of players to reference laws within their own jurisdiction to ascertain the legality of actions.",
  },
  "store": {
    "store": "Store",
    "token": "Token",
    "balance": "Balance",
    "purchase": "PURCHASE",
    "orderHistory": "Order history",
    "date": "Date",
    "payment": "Payment",
    "error": "Something Wrong!",
    "checkMinEOS": "Check : min 0.1 EOS",
    "checkMinTAZ": "Check : min 10 TAZ",
    "checkLogin": "Check : Please Login",
    "checkEOSBalance": "Check : The EOS balance is not enough",
    "checkTAZBalance": "Check : The TAZ balance is not enough",
    "close": "CLOSE",
    "success": "Purchase Success!",
    "info1": "Please type your amount below",
    "info2": "and press PURCHASE button"
  },
  "wallet": {
    "wallet": "Wallet",
    "info": "When you increase your VIP level, you can have more bonus",
    "store": "Store",
    "token": "Token",
    "balance": "Balance",
  },
  "referral": {
    "referral": "Referral",
    "link": "My referral link",
    "copy": "Copy",
    "info1": "Share the referral link with your friends. If your friend enters Guang Game and makes their first bet, you will receive ",
    "info2": "commission on all your friends' bets!",
    "copied": "Copied Successfully !"
  },
  "vip": {
    "vip": "VIP",
    "levelup1": "Just",
    "levelup3": "more to level up",
    "desc1": "VIP Bonus",
    "desc2": "You will receive a bonus on all bets you place in any games on Guang Game platform.",
    "desc3": "Bonus amount",
    "desc4": "= Bet amount * Bonus percentage.",
    "wager": "Wager",
    "tazChip": "TAZ Chip",
    "bonus": "Bonus",
    "percentage": "Percentage",
    "vipLevel": "VIP Level"
  },
  "bonusPayout": {
    "payoutPool": "Payout Pool",
    "bonus": "Bonus",
    "next": "Next Payout Time",
    "estimate": "My Estimated Payout",
    "per10kTaz": "Expected Payout Per 10K TAZ",
    "info1": "* Stake TAZ for dividends.",
    "info2": "The dividends are settled once everyday at midnight.",
    "info3": "Your portion of the payout will be credited to your balance and can be claimed at your convenience."
  },
  "bonusStake": {
    "stake": "Stake",
    "total": "Total Staked TAZ",
    "available": "Available to stake",
    "staked": "Staked",
    "unstake": "Unstake",
    "desc1": "* 24 Hours are needed to unstake. ",
    "desc2": "",
    "error": "Something Wrong !",
    "error2": "Check : Stake amount",
    "success": "Success !",
    "amount": "Amount Unstaking "
  },
  "bonusRestake": {
    "restake": "Restake",
    "remain": "Time remaining",
    "status": "Status",
    "current": "Status",
    "unstaking": "Unstaking"
  },
  "sicbo": {
    "info": {
      "tablemaximum": "Table Maximum",
      "lastresult": "Last Result",
      "howtoplay": "How to play",
      "type": "Type",
      "betamount": "Bet amount",
      "payout": "Payout",
    },
    "betting": {
      "bet": "BET ! ",
      "total": "Total Bet",
      "totalmobile": "Total"
    },
    "status": {
      "wait_result": "Waiting",
      "new_game": "New Game",
      "placing_bet": "Placing Bet",
      "timeleft": "Time left",
      "logout": "Logout",
    },
    "alert": {
      "selectchip": "Select Chip!",
      "success": "Success!",
      "transaction": "The transaction must be confirmed in 1min",
      "denied": "Please confirm the transaction",
      "wrong": "Something Wrong!",
      "maxbet": "The maximum bet is upto five.",
      "maxbetmoney": "Total Max bet is 50M",
      "maxbetcell": "Max bet for one square is upto 10M",
      "nochip": "There’s no chip placed"
    },
    "animation": {
      "start": "Start Placing Bets!",
      "waiting": "Waiting result"
    },
    "history": {
      "my": "My Bets",
      "past": "Past Record"
    }
  },
  "howto": {
    "general": {
      "line1": "There are 20 flower cards in total, two cards from 1 to 10 each.",
      "line2": "Of these 20 cards, a total of four 光 cards are included.",
      "line3": "Every turn, two cards appear randomly. Bet on which result will come."
    },
    "list": {
      "title": "List",
      "sb": "Small / Big",
      "oe": "Odd / Even",
      "pair": "Pair",
      "specific": "Specific Pair"
    },
    "smallbig": {
      "title": "Small / Big",
      "line1": "After adding numbers of two cards, the judgment is based on the last one digit.",
      "line2": "0 ~ 4 wins on Small, 5 ~ 9 wins on Big.",
      "line3": "0 ~ 4 wins on Small, 5 ~ 9 wins on Big.",
      "line4": "Ex) If the sum of two cards equals 11, it means 1."
    },
    "oddeven": {
      "title": "Odd/  Even",
      "line1": "After adding numbers of two cards, the judgment is based on the last one digit.",
      "line2": "Odd wins at Odd and even wins at Even.",
      "line3": "However, if a pair comes out, you lose."
    },
    "guang": {
      "title": "光",
      "line": "Win if any 光 card comes out.",
    },
    "pair": {
      "title": "Pair",
      "line": "If two cards of the same number appear, you win."
    },
    "specific": {
      "title": "Specific Pair (1~10 Pair)",
      "line": "If a specific pair comes out of a total of 10 pairs, you win."
    },
    "number": "If the card of that number comes out, you win."
  }
}
